meanings.definition: The state or quality of being weak or timid.
meanings.sent1: Her wimpinesses showed when she refused to stand up for herself.
meanings.sent2: His constant wimpinesses made him an easy target for bullies.
meanings.sent3: Despite his wimpinesses, he managed to muster the courage to speak up in the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The wimpinesses of the kitten made it vulnerable to the playful attacks of the puppy.
meanings.sent5: The wimpinesses of the old bridge became evident as it struggled to withstand the storm.

meanings.definition: Behavior or actions that demonstrate a lack of courage or strength.
meanings.sent1: The wimpinesses of his excuses were transparent to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She was tired of his constant wimpinesses in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent3: His wimpinesses in the haunted house made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The wimpinesses of the plant's stems made it unable to support the weight of the fruit.
meanings.sent5: The wimpinesses of the team's defense cost them the game.
